name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by madnes, Thorfinn, bug, atticusonline, chatterjee, unsentletter, aparrish)

name: centipede_damascus
text: Man I love the Trader. So much yummy stuff there.

name: senormcninjameister
text: You use the same type of hot sauce that I do. At least, when I can get to China town. Which I can't, because I'm in Japan. Still, it makes me feel good about myself.

name: ferdinand
text: sriracha?  good god, man, they sell that in the freaking gas stations where i live.

name: invidious
text: In the pumps, even.

name: waitwhat
text: Sriracha sauce is mostly the best, mostly.

name: heatbag
text: Where can I get a Cocktail Recipes?

name: twohundredninety
text: The egg placement. I love it.

name: woodenteeth
text: What do you think Onstad is saying through his egg placement? He is making a Statement. Surely.

name: sp1derbaby
text: They're tabasco eggs, silly.

name: art-vader
text: The statement being he´s gonna need a bigger fridge with a baby in the house. Or perhaps he just keeps to many eggs in his house. He should get some kind of program telling him to get more eggs

name: direhaggis
text: I love/boner srirachi sauce. The marmite is a curious addition.

name: love_is_so_punk
text:
I love the cock sauce.

No pun intended.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: I will give $50 to the man/woman that makes a decent "Godless Spaniard" and gives me the recipe.

name: zoom
text: This is so close to what I was going to say, I'd like to second it.

name: skiddyfisk
text: My google search for "godless spaniard drink recipe" led me to this very comment. I am sad that the internet does not know how to craft one. :(

name: helenabuckett
text: And a year later, nobody has troubled to make a recipe up. Bad internet, bad bad internet!

name: rearadmiral
text:
posting so far back in time, yet an hour ago.

I'm blaming you on the gin.

name: subtilior
text: Marmite is not to be refrigerated.  It is a disgrace.

name: andyfaewatford
text: Absolutely!

name: wjon
text:
Looking at the entire row of items - none of it needs to be in the fridge.

I think there's some deeper mystery to be solved here.

name: fuckalgebra
text: Peanut butter in a glass jar. Dude has class.

name: tekende
text: No Jif. Clearly Onstad's wife is not a choosy mom.

name: heccibiggs
text:
What? I have never seen peanut butter in anything other than a glass jar.

But then again I am British and we are inherently classy by nature. Excuse me, I just have to adjust my monocle.

name: rowboat
text: Peanut butter in a glass jar? No, that would never work in the States. You want the damn thing shattering every time you hurl it at one of your eight fucking asshole kids? The peanut butter bills would be through the fucking roof. I don't know what kind of endless peanut butter funds you Richie Rich Limey fucks enjoy, but times are tight in America. There are little bastards running amok in my trailer at all hours and I can't be made to buy a new jar of peanut butter every time I want to hurt one of them for being alive and talking. You people will never understand.

name: wjon
text: Typical Yanks, never doing a job properly. When we Brits throw peanut butter jars at our kids we like to do serious and permanent damage - and plastic just wont cut it (them).

name: presterjohn
text: Can Cocktail Recipes make me a cocktail incorporating Marmite, Peanut Butter, and fish eggs? I think the answer is yes ... and I am afraid.

name: i_love_kate
text: The alt text reminds me of the toaster from Red Dwarf.

name: echidnaboy
text: "Ah! So you're a waffle man!"

name: poodlelucy
text: i try to like marmite, yet i cannot.

name: tasteful
text: dude marmite's tops.

name: heccibiggs
text: Marmite can shit off.

name: cagliostro
text: I think we've all learnt something here.

name: rowboat
text: If it's anything like vegemite, I'd rather fuck it than eat it.

name: darqhermit
text: Marmite and Vegemite, although both derived from the extract of yeast, are nowhere near similar. Which one you prefer depends on which hemisphere you were born in. If you like or dislike them both equally, you most likely hail from the mysterious and morally dubious Third Hemisphere and are no friend of mine.

name: overmedicated
text: Marmite is unpleasant going in, and yet more unpleasant coming out.

name: milo
text: I thought marmite was all but impossible to source in the states. Onstad must have a source. weirdly enough I would probably really crave marmite if I left Britainland...

name: jerglar
text: Refrigerated garnish shelf? Who do you think you are, putting on such airs!

name: hatstand_mcq
text: I know that I am pretty late to this game but that is just the weirdest fridge shelf I've ever seen. Who keeps tinned food in a fridge? Who Keeps peanut butter in a fridge? Who keeps Marmite in a fridge?
